item.title: Public Datasets for Geoscience and Petrophysical Machine Learning
item.description: Many years ago, it used to be the case that well log data was locked up on servers within the oil and gas companies and access was restricted to only a handful of people. It is only in recent years that vast amounts of well log and field data has become publicly available. The following list is a compilation of websites where you can freely download well data. Click on the links to access the data repositories.
